====== Used procedure

|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:targeted-survey-fauna-active-protocol-shapes:habitat-description:used-procedure`
|Label | Used procedure

|Comment | IRI of procedure _MUST_ have the value `<https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/4bfc4796-a02f-461f-b17d-383aad328e61>`.
